title: Decision Tree Example
text: main input data two column data frame tibble edges. must two columns, first column containing node names “” nodes, second containing node names “” nodes. Node names must unique. Optionally, also define additional node attributes. Create flowchart using ggflowchart() function.  Optionally, add styling using {ggplot2} theme() function title using labs() function.
code: goldilocks <- tibble::tibble(from = c("Goldilocks",                               "Porridge", "Porridge", "Porridge",                               "Just right",                               "Chairs", "Chairs", "Chairs",                               "Just right2",                               "Beds", "Beds", "Beds",                               "Just right3"),                      to = c("Porridge",                             "Too cold", "Too hot", "Just right",                             "Chairs",                             "Still too big", "Too big", "Just right2",                             "Beds",                             "Too soft", "Too hard", "Just right3",                             "Bears!")) node_data <- tibble::tibble(name = c("Goldilocks", "Porridge", "Just right", "Chairs",                                      "Just right2", "Beds", "Just right3", "Too cold",                                      "Too hot", "Still too big", "Too big", "Too soft",                                      "Too hard", "Bears!")) %>%   dplyr::mutate(label = gsub("\\d+$", "", name)) ggflowchart(goldilocks, node_data) library(ggplot2) ggflowchart(goldilocks,             node_data,             colour = "#585c45",             text_colour = "#585c45",             arrow_colour = "#585c45") +   scale_x_reverse() +   labs(title = "The Goldilocks Decision Tree") +   theme(plot.background = element_rect(colour = "#f2e4c1", fill = "#f2e4c1"),         plot.title = element_text(size = 20, hjust = 0.5, face = "bold", colour = "#585c45"))

text: idea {ggflowchart} create simple flowcharts minimal effort. title: Generate a flowchart in ggplot2 — ggflowchart
text: data Data frame tibble edges. Must two columns, first column "" node names, second column "" node names. Node names must unique. node_data Data frame tibble node information. Must least one column called "name" node names join . Default NULL. fill Fill colour nodes. Must valid colour name hex code. Default "white". colour Outline colour nodes. Must valid colour name hex code. Default "black". text_colour Colour labels nodes. Must valid colour name hex code. Default "black". arrow_colour Colour arrows. Must valid colour name hex code. Default "black". family Font family node labels. Default "sans" x_nudge Distance centre edge node box x direction. Default 0.35. y_nudge Distance centre edge node box y direction. Default 0.25.
